title: If we could go forward in time, can we bring something back to the time we left, or would that alter the future of the time we are in? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you read enough time travel science fiction and fantasy you will come up with some answers! Pretty much all possibilities have been covered. I still think time travel is infinitely unlikely. Except that which we inexorably do daily, monthly, yearly, throughout our lives!
